title: Riot promotional codes
body: So i found promo codes on your page for riot girl tristana and dreadnight garen, and i connected through my facebook and twitter for each, but neither of the codes worked. saying they were invald/already used???

replies.body: Send in a support ticket they will add the skin to ur account
They were available for a certain time limit, just check the page again to make sure there isn't a expiration date. I only got the dreadnought garen, missed out on riot trist
Rocka is correct, i sent a ticket and without warning i have riot girl trist and garen with the skins :)
